censusaggregate 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Reassign parent vector

    reassign_parent_vector.Rd

    Update the parent (and highest parent, if relevant) for supplied vectors. Useful for piping into aggregate_census_vectors, which often uses the parent vector as a denominator. Optionally, if new_label_short is provided in vectors, the label_short field of data will also be replaced.

    reassign_parent_vector(data, vectors)

    Arguments

    data

    Census data, from e.g. list_census_vectors or get_census_vectors_and_children

    vectors

    A tibble containing vector and new_parent_vector for setting a vector's new parent vector in data. Can optionally include new_label_short to also replace the label_short field.
